valworkbench.datatypes
Class SimilarityMatrix

java.lang.Object
  valworkbench.datatypes.SimilarityMatrix

public class SimilarityMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

The SimilarityMatrix class provides an object for representing a similarity matrix.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Davide Scaturro, Filippo Utro
